replies.msg: 有冇ching玩過 kamlan 50mm 1.1 同 7artisans 35mm 1.2?? 想搵支大光圈玩下, 我見又唔係好貴

Kamlan支1.1 MK2

缺點對我都算minor：
- 聚手左少少
- 個lens cover勁on9 設計到好難cup得靚

優點：
- 好sharp好靚
- 冇vignetting 冇紫邊
- bokehlicious 影gf一流
- focus ring好順手

replies.msg: Kamlan支1.1 MK2 我覺得要收一收光圈先夠sharp

I have the 7artisans 50 1.1 and 75 1.25
They built very well but do not expect too much for the optical quality, wide open they are very soft, even stopped down the corners are still very soft.
Vignetting are also very strong wide open and many other optical flaws like strong astigmatism and wavy field curvature.

They are not bad for the money they are asking, if you are on a budget you can consider them otherwise pay a little bit more and get Codina Voigtlander lens you will get much better built and optical quality lenses.


Pardon for the English, I am on iPad Pro now and the fucking Smart Keyboard does not support 3rd party Cantonese input.
